CustomField.description: Name of the health insurance provider. Example: 'Blue Cross Blue Shield', 'Aetna', 'Medicare'. This is a key segment of information the AI agent should capture during enrollment. Insurance information is critical for program enrollment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the name of the candidate's health insurance provider (e.g., "Blue Cross Blue Shield", "Aetna", "Medicare", "UnitedHealthcare"). This is a key piece of information to capture during enrollment for verification and billing coordination.
CustomField.label: Insurance Provider
